DzMRMShape Class Reference
[Object and Geometry Objects]

A specialized shape that supports DzMRMMesh geometries. DzMRMShape provides the user control necessary for changing between levels of detail on a DzMRMMesh. More...

Inheritance diagram for DzMRMShape:

DzEnumProperty getMRMControl ()

void setMRMMesh (DzMRMMesh geom)

Detailed Description

A specialized shape that supports DzMRMMesh geometries. DzMRMShape provides the user control necessary for changing between levels of detail on a DzMRMMesh.

Sets the MRM Mesh geometry associated with this shape.
